description:
Sponsors are the financial backbone of sumo stables. Raijin stable`s sponsor is the chairman of the board and administrator of a huge hospital, Ueda-sensei. Master Raijin, Inokawa and Tatsunokawa get invited to Ueda-sensei`s daughter`s wedding, but the two main wrestlers are in Hawaii on a sumo-tour. Master decides to take Matsutaro to the wedding instead, but ... what a dangerous decision for the master to make.
Source: crunchyroll
